wattadvisor.data_models.optimization_results_scenario_kpis
==========================================================

.. py:module:: wattadvisor.data_models.optimization_results_scenario_kpis

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Contains the definition of a pydantic model
   representing the total KPIs of a single optimization scenario.

   Copyright (c) 2007, Eclipse Foundation, Inc. and its licensors. All rights reserved.
   Use of this source code is governed by a BSD-style license that can be found in the LICENSE file.
